game.name: hackSociety
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: hackSociety is an immersive MMO hacking simulator. Become part of a living, breathing simulated society in the most thorough and expansive hacker sim ever made. Will you become a legend, or fade into obscurity?
game.shortDescriptionEn: hackSociety is an immersive MMO hacking simulator. Become part of a living, breathing simulated society in the most thorough and expansive hacker sim ever made. Will you become a legend, or fade into obscurity?
